name: Flappy Bird Flash
summary: An unofficial remake of Flappy Bird for browsers made in Adobe Flash by maxblive.

name: Fleet Command
summary: International waterways become theatres of war when the world's most formidable maritime powers exchange their fatal blows. With entire fleets at your command, you must strategically deploy vessels from every class - frigate to aircraft to nuclear submarine - to maintain the precarious balance of naval power and gain position for the deadly endgame.

name: Fling to the Finish
summary: Fling to the Finish is a cooperative racing game where teammates are tethered together by a stretchy elastic rope. Get up close and personal with your partner as you share a controller to maneuver two characters bouncing, rolling, and flinging their way to the finish line!

name: Flint: Treasure of Oblivion
summary: Experience the golden age of piracy through a strong and original narrative, real-time exploration and turn-based tactical combat in Flint - Treasure of Oblivion.

name: Flipside
summary: "Flipside" is a 2D puzzle platformer game demo. The demo consists of about 30 levels from the 150 unique levels in the complete edition. You need to solve the puzzles by not only jumping but also flipping the entire screen, and avoid the traps by walking on walls, floors and ceilings!

name: Flashback
summary:
Flashback, the hit action-adventure game is back!

On its 25th anniversary, rediscover this classic, consistently ranked among the best 100 games of all time! It was one of the first games to use motion capture technology for more realistic animations, with backgrounds that were entirely hand-drawn and a gripping science-fiction storyline.

name: Flick Pool
summary: A billiards game from Tom Lake.

name: Flash Cycle 2
summary: Race for your life. The challenge is to cut off other competitors from the race and try to win. Leap over various obstacles and walls that will your opponents create. Do everything possible to come in perfect order to the finish and win the game. Can you handle it ?

name: Flatworld
summary: Explore a world full of magic, puzzles and enemies in which the main character is the weakest.

name: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel
summary: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel is a 3D third-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The game is focusing on non-textual storytelling, exploration and puzzles centered around fluffy furballs called "Fluffs". It creates a wholesome atmosphere in a stylized and colorful environment.

name: Flex City
summary:
Flex City - The Ultimate Sandbox Driving and Racing Game Experience

Challenge yourself in the ultimate sandbox experience with Flex City, where the heart-pounding thrill of driving and racing games takes center stage. Dive into a sprawling open world and carve your path in a grand auto adventure filled with car and motorbike racing, drifting competitions, and the high-stakes life of a grand criminal. Unite in gangs and rule the streets in this multiplayer online sandbox game, where every decision shapes your destiny in a vibrant gangster city.

name: Flying Saucer
summary: A game where you play as a caveman that hits a falling UFO with an alien in it with a bat to make it travel as far as possible.

name: Floating Islands of Nucifera
summary: Floating Islands of Nucifera is an open world shopkeeping game set in an abandoned world in the sky. Adventure across the fantasy world of Nucifera in your airship, summon powerful creatures to your side to aid in dangerous turn-based combat, and loot treasures to help pay off your family's debt!

name: Flipper Soccer
summary: Play a quick game of Flipper Soccer - the game that mixes football with pinball. Control the flippers to score goals against your opponent, who can be your friend or the computer.

name: Flashback
summary: Flashback is a science fiction platform video game remake of the original 1992 Flashback. The game was developed by the original game designer, Paul Cuisset, with his studio, VectorCell, and published by Ubisoft. The game was released on August 21, 2013 on Xbox Live Arcade.

name: FlatOut: Head On
summary:
A port of the PlayStation 2 game FlatOut 2.
This version has reduced visuals and destruction detail then the original PS2 game but includes the carnage game mode added in FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage as well as that versions soundtrack.

Flatout brings its destructive high octane motorized anarchy to the PSP, for the first time. Boasting the most four-wheeled mayhem ever seen, with nine different game modes, including 36 carnage challenges, full career Championship, destruction derbies, multiplayer party mode and the bone-crunching Ragdoll stunt mode.

name: Flockout
summary: Flockout is a chaotic 4-player local party game where you play as furious, fluffy sheep in wild mini-games! Chase thieves, slam goals in sheep soccer, or race across wobbly obstacle courses at wool-warping speed. With every match, chaos, laughter, and revenge pile up — making it the perfect couch-party showdown for friends, families, and frenemies alike.

name: Fly Destroyer
summary:
Do you hate flies? Then this game is for you! 
Flies .. they are everywhere! Arm yourself and destroy them all!

name: Fluffy Memories
summary: Fluffy Memories is a cozy tile-matching memory game featuring a variety of cute and kinky furry characters who'd love to show off for you when you win a match!

name: FloorBreaker
summary: Smash through the enemy's floor in this fast-paced ball-blasting battle! Break the Floor is a physics-driven, high-impact action game for solo players or 1-4 players.

name: Flightless
summary: Flightless is a tile-based puzzle adventure game. Navigate your way through a series of floating islands, each presenting a curious puzzle. A minimalist art style and calming piano soundtrack complement senses of wonder and discovery.

name: FlyingMetalSuit
summary: FlyingMetalSuit is an VR aerial racing game. You fly in a superhero-style in an amazing suit during incredibles and dangerous races. 12 Grand Prix, 3 differents worlds, up to the challenge ?

name: Flocky the Cat
summary: A traitor in your village kills your father and kidnaps your sister. You are a young cat who must save his sister and other clans of cats.

name: Floors
summary: Embark on a procedural liminal journey filled with eerie, unfriendly faces. Walk, explore, and descend to the first floor to escape. No monsters will chase you, but they can watch and appear when you aren't looking. This can evoke a fear of an endless labyrinth and create a sense of anxiety.

name: Floppy Knights
summary: Meet the Floppy Knights: tangible projections summoned from floppy disks! Tactics fuse with card game mechanics as Phoebe and Carlton - a brilliant young inventor & her robot-arm bestie - square off in turn-based battles. Select your Knights, hone your deck, and execute your strategy for victory!

name: Flight of the Icarus
summary: Flight of the Icarus is a game where you play as a privateer who owns an airship that helps ferry goods from town to town in a post-apocalyptic world where the skies are dominated by pirates and danger. Shoot down enemy aeroplanes with a variety of deadly weaponry. Keep the ship from falling out the sky.

name: Flynn: Son of Crimson
summary: Traverse a beautifully hand crafted world and unearth the mysteries of a dark past in this fast paced 2D action platformer with metroidvania elements.

name: Fleshbound
summary: Sam agrees to help his friends by staying the night in their house while they leave for urgent business. Outside, a heavy rainstorm rages, with loud thunderclaps shaking the walls and creating an oppressive atmosphere.

name: Flat Eye
summary: Flat Eye is a resource management sim with an emphasis on story and narrative choices. Oversee the world’s leading technological hub while you explore stories linked to discoverable technology and interact with your most loyal customers. Flat Eye - We're watching.

name: FLY: Forever Loving You 2
summary: A reboot and sequel to FLY: Forever Loving You. It contains, so far, the entire remastered first season, and 11 episodes of the second one.

name: Fluidity: Spin Cycle
summary: Fluid-based puzzle/platforming for the 3DS eShop.

name: Flat Galaxy: An Idlemare
summary: Flat Galaxy: An Idlemare is a one-button arcade experience set in a surreal sci-fi training simulation. Precision and strategy are key as you guide a robot through six challenging levels, backed by an original soundtrack with live guitars.

name: Flight Control HD
summary: You’re an air traffic controller at an increasingly busy airport; just point and drag aircraft to their landing zones with your mouse or trackpad. Sounds easy? It isn’t! You’ll need nerves of steel and smart strategy to keep the chaos under control. Flight Control HD has been especially redesigned for PC and Mac, with updated graphics and an even tougher new challenge – the Steam exclusive Stunt map where you can increase your score by flying through the gates before landing.

name: Flywrench
summary: Flywrench is a frenetic action game from the makers of Nidhogg about piloting an aerobatic ship through the depths of space.

name: Floating Sandbox
summary: This game is a realistic two-dimensional particle system, which uses mass-spring networks to simulate rigid bodies (such as ships) floating in water and exchanging heat with their surroundings. You can punch holes in an object, slice it, apply forces and heat to it, set it on fire, and smash it with bomb explosions. Once water starts rushing inside the object, it will start sinking and, if you're lucky enough, it will start breaking up!

name: Flan
summary: Operate two people at the same time! ? An action game that thinks of each other! When the girl woke up, a dark and cold place had spread. As the girl advances her feet, she meets the frozen black knight. Join the power of two people and get to the truth!

name: Floodrush
summary:
8 Seekers rush to collect treasure and battle for supremacy! Choose from 3 Seekers, summon a rowdy crew, and dominate the island before it sinks. Surprise your foes by casting rum bombs, nets and exploding watermelons.
Mobilize troops like the muscular Boxer Crab, or invest in heavy troops like the mighty Lava Rex. Swarm and overwhelm others with Pistol Fish, Raptors, and more! Find higher tier cards to build an unstoppable force.

name: Floating Runner: Quest for the 7 Crystals
summary:
Floating Runner: Quest for the 7 Crystals is a 3D platform adventure consisting of fourteen levels across seven different themed environments, with classic locales ranging from tropical forests to frozen tundra. As in the Mega Man series of titles, players can choose which of the worlds to attempt in whatever order they so desire.

Populating each world are enemies in the guise of cute animals that can be dispatched using power-ups and weapons found scattered throughout the area. While avoiding the treacherous chasms and gaps that permeate the floating worlds, players will need to seek out special gems while keeping an eye on the time remaining to complete each world. Continues are unlimited so failure is little more than a temporary hindrance.

name: Fling Friends
summary: Fling Friends is a chaotic co-op physics platformer where one fling yeets everyone! Solve color-based puzzles, climb together (or fall together), and laugh your way through a vibrant Arabian-inspired world.

name: FlexibleJigsaw: Journey
summary: Drawing from the heritage of classic games and offering novel, ingenious gameplay, Flexible Jigsaw: Journey presents a unique puzzle experience.

name: Flauresyn
summary: A town lost to madness, eaten by the wild anguish of its former denizens, drenched in divine blood and twitching with the echoes of those struck down. Your duty is to cleanse the sick and restore what remains of this terrible place - You are the agent of its rebirth. Flauresyn is a 3-map excursion into the heart of a dying settlement. You are Ayba, a retired goddess once worshipped in this place, and with your waning strength, you must make amends for your neglect.

name: Flowerbud
summary: A narrative-driven flower shop management and relationship sim where YOUR choices shape the town’s future. Customize your flower shop, craft unique items, and unlock different outcomes through branching dialogue and evolving relationships.

name: Flagsplosion
summary: Flagsplosion is a flag identifying endless quizzer with over 600 current flags from around the world, 100 Training levels, Practice Mode, and Endless Mode.

name: Flappy Golf Party
summary: Flappy Golf Party is a fast-paced game that combines easy-to-learn controls with intuitive yet deep mechanics which are fun to master! Race your wacky birdies to the hole across 90 fantastical holes. Features: - Simple 2-button controls that are quick to learn - 10 unique courses to explore and master - Up to 6 players of golf racing rivalry - 12 bespoke birides to express yourself

name: Flamebreak
summary: Flamebreak is a roguelite action RPG featuring a unique blend of twinstick meets MOBA arena combat. Each procedurally generated run presents new challenges while your randomized hero's race, weapon, and skills inspire new playstyles and character builds.

name: Flight of the Amazon Queen: 25th Anniversary Edition
summary: The year is 1949 and you assume the role of Joe King, a pilot for hire who will embark on a quest to rescue a kidnapped princess and in the process, encounter a dangerous temple, fearsome Amazonian warriors, and a powerful mad scientist intent on taking over the world!

name: Fluffy Escape: Cryptic Cube
summary: Fluffy Escape: Cryptic Cube is an escape room-style game where each room holds clues, puzzles, and strange mechanisms! Doors are already open, spaces overlap, and the cube itself seems to bend in ways it shouldn’t. Strange? Absolutely!

name: Flinch
summary:
Flinch is a VR horror game about terrifying yourself, but more importantly your friends and loved ones. You're racing against time and trying to keep your cool. Flinch monitors your behaviors and can detect when you jerk or move suddenly if you get frightened. Eeek! A second player or party can use the keyboard to try to scare the in-game player.  
Navigate using torches and lighting candles. Discover spell books and tasks for you to complete before the time runs out. Navigate a maze of suspense and last as long as you can!  
 
Most importantly, don't flinch!

name: FleeTing
summary: Move higher and higher, passing destructive areas on the way! Change the direction of your character with a single button on the screen, do not forget to collect power-ups that will help you in the game!

name: Fledgling Heroes
summary:
Leap from the nest into a fun-filled adventure! Meet cute feathered friends, each with their own wondrous story to tell, as they dodge dastardly pirate lizARRrds, dash through frozen forests, dive through sunken temples, and flap their way from fledglings to a fully-fledged heroes!

- It’s dangerous to go alone - play with a friend! Drop in another player at any time for some cooperative assistance… or some competitive capers.
- Flex your creative muscles and make your very own levels with the built-in editor. Share them with your friends and the world!
- Customise your cute birds with wacky colours, or recreate your favourite variations found in the wild.
- Explore 90+ hand-crafted levels set in gorgeously unique and colourful environments.
- Compete for the fastest time in race levels, charge through breakneck-paced endless levels, and go head-to-head with dragons!

name: Flight Unlimited Las Vegas
summary:
The popular iPhone Flight Simulator with over 4,000,000 downloads world wide is now available on the Steam Network for PC and MAC.
The Steam version features enhanced lighting effects, enhanced shadow effects, and all of the aircraft unlocked and available to pilot.

Experience the thrill of flight with Flight Unlimited Las Vegas. Enjoy flying over the city of Las Vegas in one of 8 unique aircraft or embark on a campaign of missions for the Las Vegas Mob Boss.

name: Flipull
summary: Game Boy port of Plotting for the Arcade.

name: Flooded
summary: Flooded is a reversed city-builder, in which you need to optimize your production on an island that shrinks over time. Gather enough resources to flee to safety, while the surrounding world is getting flooded.

name: Flowers: Le Volume sur Automne
summary: As the summer heat fades, Suoh Shirahane is just one step away from unraveling the mystery of why her beloved Amitie partner left in the spring.

name: Flyland Wars: 2 Not Yours Mine
summary: A sci-fi flying person vs. robot battle game. A stolen asteroid on this flyland contains a labyrinthine mine named Not Yours Mine, and may still have murderous minedroids and a security force-- but certainly does have poison-gas-spewing spiderbots. You have to destroy them all!

name: Flea Market Simulator '24
summary: Flea Market Simulator '24 Bargain&Buy, Repair&SellTake care of antique or fake items.Adding this game to your wishlist allows me to improve my game further. If you care about my project, add it to your wishlist to improve the game together with me.

name: Florescer
summary: Florescer is a story driven game delevoped with the help of a Brazilian NGO called Florescer, an organization that houses transsexual and transvestite women. The game is meant to invoke reflection and to generate empathy torwards trans people, inserting the player in the role of a teenage transgender girl and depicting the hardships and prejudices present in her daily life.

name: Flying Sushi
summary: Flying Sushi is a fast-paced, side-scrolling arcade game where you control a sentient piece of sushi as it soars through the air. Navigate through endless obstacles while collecting bonuses and power-ups to rack up the highest score possible. How far can you go in this quirky and fun adventure?

name: Flutter of birds II: Tenshi-tachi no Tsubasa
summary:
The miracle happens again... in another country-

The son of an Englishman and a Japanese woman, our main character is Shin'ya. Having grown up in his father's native land, he wanted to visit the homeland of his mother, who died when he was young. White snow covers the town of Kuramachi. His other hometown, the last trace of his mother. That is where his father and mother met and were married. And the time comes when Shin'ya's wish is granted. His aunt Miyu says she'll look after him at her church..

In his mother's hometown, Shin'ya injures his leg and goes to a clinic. As Shin'ya stays in the small, snow-covered town, waiting for his leg to heal, he encounters various young women.

name: Floor Massacre
summary: You have to survive in a huge house firing off numerous zombies and moving along the floors to the end of the level.

name: Flashback to Hell
summary: A 15-level mapset for DOOM 2 that is compatible with the "-complevel 9" setting. Features new music by PRIMEVAL and James Paddock, as well as high-quality redone sound effects by Per Kristian Risvik. If the new music tracks are buggy in ZDOOM while using FMOD, updating to the latest non-official revision might fix the problem. I recommend using Fluidsynth, though. The first eleven maps are tech-base themed and are re-imaginings of the first eleven maps of Doom II. The next three maps are hell-themed, with the fifteenth map serving as an epilogue. There are two bonus Wolfenstein 3D themed levels in the two secret map slots, accessible via the epilogue.

name: Flip It
summary: Wrong side

name: Flatline
summary: Play as Scarlett, a freelance cyborg ninja, in a neon city filled with corporate drones. Use her top of the line sword and bio enhancements to dash throughout the city and chain your dashes through drones. Make sure to watch your health, too many mistakes and you might Flatline.

name: Floss
summary: A fast-paced top-down shooter without any excess. Built on aggressive movement, precise controls, and real challenge. Designed for players who love to learn, adapt, and master mechanics.

name: Fly Wheel
summary: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of Fly Wheel, where sparks fly in a spectacular display of robotics mayhem! Fly Wheel is a thrilling combat sports game that pits competitors against each other in an excitement arena, get ready to enter the arena of fierce combat, Join the competition now.

name: Flatspace
summary: Flatspace is a top-down space trading game with the emphasis on freedom and exploration. You become captain of a spaceship in a living simulation of a distant galaxy. As a space pilot, you decide how to earn a living; command your crew, buy new and better ships and equipment, and explore.

name: Flip Master
summary: Master the trampolines with Frontflips, Backflips, Gainers & Layouts! With a custom animated Ragdoll Physics engine, Flip Master is the most dynamic and entertaining Trampoline experience ever created! Defy the laws of physics!

name: Flickle
summary: Flickle is a daily browser-based puzzle game where players guess movies and TV shows from a series of 6 frames. Inspired by games like Framed and Wordle, the difficulty decreases with each new frame revealed. Players can track their daily streaks and share their results without spoilers.

name: Fluffy Cubed
summary:
Fluffy Cubed is a minimalist puzzle game where the mechanics are inspired by the famous Sokoban genre, of Japanese origin.

In this game, you play a kitten in the shape of a cube that must move the boxes to their places. But is not that simple, you'll need to analyze well your movements to make sure that the boxes will no get trapped.

The interface is simple, cute and you don't have to worry getting only one way to solve them, because there is many ways to complete the levels.

name: Flicky
summary: Sega Genesis/Mega Drive port of Flicky.

name: Floating Life 2
summary: Floating Life2 is a sandbox fairy quest where you interact with NPCS in real time and experience the ups and downs of fairy quest together. Join xiuxian Zong Gate, experience the rich adventure map and real-time combat, gradually discover the truth of the earth and earth changes, change your fate.

name: Flying Hero X
summary: Evil unicorns conquered Meow York City! It's about time to unleash your true hero skill and get some revenge! Save all the cute kitten in this thriving city on a beautiful island and upgrade your gear to fly faster than any other hero ever! And finally... show those unicorns what you're made of! FLYING HERO X offers an explorable GTA styled open world with lots of missions and dozens of easter eggs and hidden areas to discover (including a Cow- Level).

name: Flashing Lights: Beast Swat Truck DLC
summary: Strengthen your police department forces with the Beast Swat Truck DLC!

name: FlyWings 2018 Flight Simulator: Baron G58
summary: Includes Baron G58 aircraft.

name: Fly Over! 100KM! Mountains!
summary: This is an easy-to-learn yet incredibly challenging endless flight game. Control your little plane through the ever-changing sky, nimbly avoiding obstacles and desperately trying to escape the ever-approaching tornado behind you. Every advance is a test of skill and perseverance.

name: Fly High Collection
summary: Spread your wings and start flying like you’ve never been before!

name: Flock
summary: Flock is a multiplayer co-op game about the joy of flight and collecting adorable flying creatures with your friends. Soar through beautiful landscapes, seeking out rare and elusive creatures to add to your flock.

name: Flipping Death
summary: Possess the living, aid the dead and flip between the worlds of Flipping Death - a puzzling adventure platformer where you find yourself filling in for Death. Maybe your new powers will help you solve the mystery of your own demise?

name: Floor Kids
summary: Floor Kids is a new breakdance battle game featuring unique freestyle gameplay, rhythm challenges, and multiplayer sessions. Discover stylized hand-drawn graphics by award-winning animator JonJon set to an original soundtrack by world-renowned scratch DJ/producer Kid Koala. Innovative controls allow you the freedom to play the way you like with a dynamic scoring system that rewards your moves based on musicality, originality, and style. Build up your crew of bboys and bgirls, unlocking new characters and locations as you cross the city, busting hundreds of different moves and countless combinations on your journey from the corner to the club. Bring Your Skills. Build Your Crew. Find Your Style.

name: Flarebound
summary: A tactical roguelike where you throw flares to briefly pierce the darkness, draw a path in pitch black, and race dripping lava following you through the volcanic tunnels. Plan fast, dig deep, and descend to the safe place before the lava swallows everything.

name: Flaurel's Diaries
summary: A visual novel about my OC, Flaurel. Her full name is Flaurel Gerania el Caryana. She’s a character, but also a part of me. I hope you enjoy reading her story as much as I enjoyed writing it. Thank you for playing.

name: Flat MMO
summary: Flat MMO is an online 2D browser-based MMO where you can trade with players, train various skills, fight monsters, complete quests, earn achievements, and explore a massive world.

name: Fly Fish
summary: This is a casual game that does not contain any violent elements. We will experience its way home from the perspective of a young flying fish. Go home by sprinting, jumping and flying through the dilemma on the road, Improve players' ability to resist setbacks

name: Flutter Away
summary: Enjoy the serenity of the Amazon rainforest in this cozy short nature exploration game. As a butterfly researcher on a five-day campaign trip, explore nearby tracks, take photos, meet animal friends, and journal the discoveries found along the way!

name: Flower of Anarchy
summary: You are the leader of a gang of slave raiders in post-apocalyptic America

name: Flesh
summary: Third person horror adventure designed for Half-Life 2.

name: Flat Kingdom
summary: Flat Kingdom is filled with fun platforming action, puzzles and some Metroidvania elements. It also features a unique combat system! Instead of directly attacking your foes, you’ll have to touch them while transformed in the correct shape to beat them! Kinda like a rock-paper-scissor game. Every shape in Flat Kingdom beats the opposite, so sharp triangles can defeat the soft circles, heavy squares beat the fragile triangles and squishy circles can triumph over the slow squares. Both enemies and puzzles can be beaten using the correct shape and strategy, so you'll have to observe them and come up with the best solution. You can also learn new abilities along the way that will help you solve even more puzzles, beat enemies faster and reach new areas that were inaccessible to you before!

name: Fly to Death! 2D Jumping Game
summary: Fly, dodge, and survive in Fly to Death!, a fast-paced free arcade game. Beat levels or chase high scores in endless mode. Unlock new characters, customize them with cool gear, and build your own levels to share!

name: Flying Car Transport Simulator
summary: Drive hi-tech flying cars in the all-new exciting car driving simulator game. Drive fast cars down city streets or fly high in the sky above the city like an airplane. Help pick up taxi fares in the latest in taxi driving experiences, fly passengers in style in the best of flying cars. The latest in driving and flying simulations with one of the best flying car games on the store!

name: FlowCity Builder
summary: FlowCity Builder is a cozy and relaxing low-poly fantasy city builder. Create big cities from small villages. Manage your resources and fulfill the demands of your citizens!

name: Flick Champions Winter Sports
summary: Take to the slopes, ice-rinks, and snow in this winter sports-themed edition of Flick Champions. Choose a nation to represent in 8 winter sports including Slalom, Ski Jumping, Ice Hockey and more. Pick a country and lead them to victory. Master the art of flicking to win the gold trophy in 18 challenging cup events. Alternatively, create your own playlists in Champ mode. Try your fingers at eight chilly events including Slalom, Skating, Ski Jumping, Ice Hockey, Curling Snowball fight, Biathlon and Sledges. Earn experience as you play and unlock up to 30 items such as a speed boosts, perfect finishes and more.

name: Fluxteria
summary:
Welcome to Fluxteria, non-stop arcade-space-shooting action in full 3D. 
Four modes of play: Story Mode, Survival Mode, Timed-Attack Mode and Obstacle Race Mode.

name: Flight Pilot Simulator: 3D Flying Games
summary:
Unleash your inner Maverick, become a pilot and conquer the skies.
+ Fun and challenging missions on beautiful scenarios
+ 20 realistic planes: from single engine props to jets, airliners and military aircraft.
+ Explore a huge open map with tons of surprises in free flight mode
+ Immersive scenarios: emergencies, rescue missions, rough landings, fires, races and more!

Download now and don't miss amazing updates!

COMING SOON: NEW LEVELS AND PLANES!

● What our players are saying

- This is a great game. Easy to play and an easy way to kill some time in between appointments. A must have. I spend hours playing this game. Simplistic but addicting! Love it

- Very good game, but completely addicting. Finish whatever you have to before even starting.

- The game is really fun. It's got all awesome graphics. It is definitely the best. I have never played such an awesome game. Whoever doesn't like this game has a problem.

- That's right one of the best games I have ever played so if you are looking for a good time by just sitting around this is the app for you!

- I just downloaded it and it's so fun and addictive I recommend this to people who like games on mobile devices.

name: Flatout: Stuntman
summary: Have a take-off run with one of the many types and sorts of vehicles, launce your handpicked character (out of many, one even crazier as the other) and proceed to aim for the objects that will do you the most damage... thus earning you the most points! Try and take some coins along the way. Ragdoll fun for everone! This contains a ton of different and fun themes, stunts, plenty of vehicles and numerous characters to have fun with.

name: Floor 100
summary:
Thousands of players leave notes to guide—or troll each other through a weekly dungeon to reach FLOOR 100.
Play with up to 4 friends, but work together as a community to reach FLOOR 100!

name: Flappy Bird Ultra
summary: A casual game that spans 2D and 3D dimensions. In the process of advancing, players need to dodge bullet attacks and attack enemies. The game features a seamless transition between 2D and 3D dimensions. Players can control a bird to embark on their journey.

name: Flicker
summary: Flicker is a text-free, rule-discovery puzzle game where the goal is simple: light all candles before your flame flickers out. Each puzzle is crafted for you to uncover the mechanics naturally—no instructions, just the joy of discovery.

name: Flood Descendance
summary: Flood Descendance is a platformer-roguelike co-op multiplayer game. Work with up to 5 other players to press buttons, toggle switches and parkour out of the facility! Purchase upgrades to descend further and extend your run. Will you reach the bottom?

name: FL Tron
summary:
FL Tron is an arcade game that combines aspects of the iconic snake game together with the iconic Tron movies and games. During each level you must control your very own Tron style snake and try to outwit your opponent and box them in - you must try and surround them and force them to crash!

Use the arrow keys to move your own snake and try to avoid hitting your own trail. Each match consists of 5 rounds and it is the first one to three rounds who wins. Don't forget to use your turbo boost if you need to suddenly dash by your opponent but remember to keep control! As you progress the levels become increasingly difficult and you must work hard to outplay your enemy!

name: Flip Tale
summary: On the way home after work, the leading character saw a streak of light and a little boy. Suddenly, he found that he had been in a different world and got an ability to "flip". The player has to interact with the world by the ability to "flip" and finally find out the truth of the whole story.

name: Flatlands
summary: Animals trapped in the magical book and transformed into cards. They need to defeat the enemies in the plane world to escape! Card battles, resource management, production line construction, RTS-style free exploration.

name: Flappiper: Remade
summary: Lost in some mysterious facility, avoid obstacles in a parody of Flappy Bird. Purchase upgrades, equip skins, survive encounters all in order to investigate the questionable decisions behind a monopolized corporation.

name: Flesh Made Fear: 1998 Theme
summary: The 1998 Theme DLC outfits both main characters in retro-inspired uniforms that capture the gritty spirit of late-90s survival horror.

name: Flesh Made Fear: Summer in Rotwood
summary: The Lake Rotwood Getaway DLC introduces new swimsuit outfits for both main characters, adding a chilling summer twist to your survival.

name: Flappy
summary: Flappy is a puzzle game by in the same vein as the Eggerland series and Sokoban that is obscure outside Japan. It features Flappy, a somewhat mole-like character who must complete each level by pushing a blue stone from its starting place to the blue tile destination.

name: Flight Simulator Airplane Game
summary: Airplane flight simulator adventure games offer a unique and thrilling gaming experience to fulfill your dreams of becoming a skilled pilot. Plane games pilot simulator 3D has an immersive and realistic Flight Simulator gaming experience. Airplane games provide a realistic plane simulation of flight physics, aircraft models, and environments in flight pilot games. You will experience the ultimate airplane flying fun in this free flight simulator game.

name: FlashInvaders
summary:
YOUR MISSION
Spot and "flash" the street mosaics of Invader. Fill your gallery and score points.
Good Luck & Have Fun !

FlashInvaders is the official application of the artist Invader.
Search for his thousands of mosaics all over the world, flash them and earn points.
Successfully flashed mosaics are added to your own gallery, where you can find them again at any time.

name: Floribella
summary:
Floribella is a platformer game released by Move Interactive in partnership with SIC, based on the second season of the Portuguese soap opera, Floribella.

In this game, you can play as Floribella or Count Máximo and explore three different game scenarios, the Garden, the Mansion and the Palace.

It features several missions and at the end of each mission, the player will have the opportunity to face super enemies.

name: Flashloop
summary: Due to engine failure, the ship crashes onto an uninhabited planet. During his research, the captain finds out that the area is inhabited by angry creatures, and the ship was shot down by someone. These mysteries of the dreadful planet will lead the researcher to terrible discoveries

name: Flute of Gobelin
summary: Flute of Gobelin is a reverse bullet hell where you command a legendary flutist who hypnotizes goblins to fight by his side. Build your squad and survive endless human hordes out to capture you.

name: Flutterfield
summary: Flutterfield is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Buy butterflies and raise them in real time, or catch fully grown ones yourself. Unlock, upgrade, and customize habitats while filling your collection with real-life butterfly species!

name: Flightpath
summary: A story-driven, quirky shoot'em up, where your path choices affect the outcome of the story. Select one of three possible characters, each with its own storyline and see how the choices you make change the way the game unfolds.

name: Fluffy Showdown
summary: Chaotic third-person multiplayer shooter where adorable animals battle in TDM, FFA, Capture the Egg, Stack Off, Gun Soccer, and Basketball, or fight off waves of zombies in single-player mode.

name: Fleshbreak
summary: A story-driven survival visual novel inspired by SCP-610. Face a flesh-spreading outbreak, make brutal moral choices, protect the people you can’t let go of, and uncover the terrifying truth behind the disease.

name: Float Your Goat
summary: A wacky physics puzzler where you (sometimes haphazardly) engineer rafts that float a goat and his "friends" across the seas. Use various materials to keep them dry and sane.

name: Flanker: Call of the Ghost
summary: A vertical scroll shooter sci-fi space combat game where you pilot your spaceship through 25 challenging levels, engaging in intense battles against 75 unique enemy types. Master precise shooting mechanics, dodge incoming fire, collect power-ups to enhance your ship, and face epic boss battles.

name: Flying Islands
summary: Flying Islands is a parkour game with a Stylized-Town theme. You jump and climb on objects. But don't forget! If you fall, you start from the very beginning!

name: Flash Cat
summary: Weave your feline way along trap laden courses aboard your legged craft.

name: Flag Capture
summary: Flag Capture was one of the eleven Atari 2600 titles that were part of the second wave of games released in 1978. It can best be compared to a very early and primitive Minesweeper. One or two players must attempt to discover which tile a flag is hidden under. Players are given clues such as directional arrows which indicate the flags location, or numeric tiles which indicate the flag's distance. Players must also watch out for bombs which explode if revealed.

name: Flipple
summary: Flipple is a word transformation game that challenges your vocabulary and problem-solving skills! In Flipple, you start with a given word and aim to transform it into a target word by changing one letter at a time. Each change must result in a valid word, making each move a test of your word knowledge and strategic thinking.

name: Flowers of Starlight
summary:
Aster's a simple girl, at her core. All she really wants to do is enjoy her new life at uni, join a club, and spend every possible waking moment playing Magica Fantasia Online (she's not addicted) with her online crush Starsiren.

She's gonna tell her, OK? Just... when they meet up for MagiCon. Honest.

However, a teeny tiny complication arises on her first day at uni, when Aster just so happens to bump into Maristela, the single prettiest girl she's ever seen in her entire life.

And she's not just pretty. Mari's smart, she's funny, and Aster would happily listen to her ramble for hours about whatever the heck she wants to, if only she had a little more courage to do so.

Torn between the friend she's loved forever, and the new girl who it feels like she's always known, Aster faces the toughest decision imaginable, and she's not even been here for a week!

A game about love, new experiences, and the fact that nerdy neurodivergent girls are cute and you should date them.

name: Flobe
summary:
Forever Humble PDX via Skinny Jean Death Studios in collaboration with Porcelin Labs, presents FLOBE, an unique game with an emphasis on quick pick & play action and casually intense gameplay! 
 
Use both analog sticks to control the blue line's position and length! Collect friendly characters in order to fill your multiplier for a higher score! Missing them will break your multiplier and cause the length of your bar to expand. Watch out for the green ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s, red ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s and those god damn bombs, if they pierce your bar it's Game Over! Advance your gameplay to multiple color collectibles and intense enemy formation challenges.

name: Fluffy Party
summary: Join the ultimate party game where you and your friends compete as fluffy creatures in wild mini-games! Jump, race, and outsmart your rivals in this chaotic, fun-filled world. Only the fluffiest will rise to the top — are you ready to party?

name: Floor Observer
summary: You are being hired by the unknown company to observe the area of a different places with the special elevator. Your job is to observe the floor and make sure that everything is in place on each floor. If something is wrong, press the red button, if not, press the white button. Can you make it to floor 30 and survive this job?

name: Flowershop Master Yuukarin!
summary: Yuuka Kazami is running a flower shop?! In [Flowershop Master Yuukarin!], Yuuka tries to run a flowr shop in Gensokyo, which has been suddenly dominated by foodie culture.

name: Flood Parkour Obby
summary: Can you survive the flood?

name: Fluffy Horde + Clumsy Rush
summary: The Fluffy Horde is coming! Save your crops from the enemy and try to withstand the rabbit Tsunami. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family. Why pick one when you can have them both.

name: Flaming Zombooka
summary: Blast zombies to pieces with your bazooka.

name: Flyist
summary: You control a small plane. You need to fly over and under the rocks and collect stars of distinction along the way.

name: FloraLumina
summary: FloraLumina is a peaceful, magical gardening game where sunlight, moonlight, and shifting weather impact your garden's growth. Nurture your garden of beautiful hand-drawn flowers, enjoy soft ambience, and play at your own pace.

name: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden
summary: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden is a whimsical single player or couch co-op adventure! Protect your dad's pumpkin patch from a relentless insect invasion. Engage in charming arcade action, place strategic traps, and battle it out in skill-testing boss battles. Perfect for all ages!

name: Flowtris
summary: Flowtris is more than just Tetris: it’s a tool for evaluating unique gaming experiences. Flowtris is designed with game modes that can deliver unique experiences and comes with a feedback survey tool that you can fill out and contribute to better games.

name: Flee the Fallen
summary: Flee the Fallen is a thrilling 2D zombie survival game where you fight relentless undead, switch between powerful weapons, and battle through intense encounters. Every moment tests your reflexes, strategy, and will to survive.

name: Flying Chicken
summary:
Our lovely chicken wants to fly, but OMG! Poops are falling down!
Beware, and move around to get away from the poops! You can double jump too!

name: Fluffy Store
summary: A string of mysterious wind chimes brought three lovely and uninvited kemonomimi girls to this small convenience store. At such a summer night full of surprises and excitement, what lies ahead on their road of adventure?

name: Flower Power
summary: Flower Power is the name of an e-Reader application from the Expedition Base Set. It is a minigame featuring Butterfree. Three cards are required to play Flower Power: Caterpie, Metapod and Butterfree.

name: Floatineer
summary: The game is set in a world where lands have vanished beneath the waves. Players experience life as floating engineers, using modular architectural blocks to rebuild shelters that can withstand various disasters and fulfill villagers' aesthetic requirements within a given time limit.

name: Flaskoman
summary: Flaskoman is a puzzle platformer in a steampunk laboratory. Use mysterious liquids to activate lab mechanism and your abilities.

name: Flesh Farm
summary: Flesh Farm is a third-person shooter inspired by 90s horror classics. Battle through a cult-run farm to find your missing wife and son. Hack with an axe, shred with a chainsaw and blast enemies with a shotgun. Solve puzzles, collect body parts, and uncover dark hidden secrets in the compound.

name: Fly Light
summary: Fly Light is a game in which you need to turn on lamps located on 4 different sides, thereby attracting midges to you. Thus, you need to lure as many midges as possible to the exploding area. But you need to be careful, because if you attract a midge too close to you, it can sit on the lamp, thereby partially blocking the glow range of the lamp, which will mean that you will not be able to attract a new midge so easily. You will lose when the midges stick to one of the lamps so that it can no longer shine. You get points for the number of midges destroyed using explosions.

name: Florensia
summary:
Florensia is a Free-to-Play MMORPG and with it´s 3D anime style the game shows you its legendary worlds ashore and at sea.
Mysterious islands, the great ocean, dungeons, picturesque pirates and dangerous monsters are waiting to be discovered.

name: Fly to Kuma Maker
summary:
"New stages are packed with contraptions to block the Kuma's progress!
Solve the puzzles to get the Kuma to their destination!
Try your hand at designing your own stages with Maker Mode!
Make your own original stages and share them for players world wide to try!

name: Fling!
summary:
The latest puzzle-sensation from the makers of Fuzzle has finally arrived after over one year in development!

Featuring 10,000s of unique puzzles, such that no two puzzles you encounter are ever the same, and split into 30 levels of increasing difficulty, Fling guarantees you many long hours of puzzling fun!

Each puzzle has a single, unique solution, and is solved by simply flinging (pushing) the furballs, and watching them bump each other off the edge of the screen, until only one is left.

name: flOw
summary:
flOw is a game about piloting an aquatic organism through a surreal biosphere where players consume other organisms, evolve, and dive into the abyss. With an embedded design of DDA (dynamic difficulty adjustment), players with differing skill levels can intuitively customize their game experience and enjoy the game at their own pace.

You can play as one of 5 creatures, each in a unique environment. Lose yourself in the crisp “deep blue” in full HD at 1080p and 5.1 Surround Sound. Use the SIXAXIS motion sensors on the DUALSHOCK wireless controllers for an organic experience that will allow you to glide, flit, and flOw through the universe.

name: Flatspace: Music Pack 2
summary: 9 new in-game music tracks to enhance Flatspace. Like any in-game music for Flatspace, these will trigger at random when you enter a new sector.

name: Fluffy Snakes
summary:
Fluffy Snakes — Fluffy fun for the whole family!
Compete, grow, and conquer in a world of adorable snakes and playful battles!

name: Flock Frenzy
summary:
Lead your flock through a chaotic endless runner where every decision matters! Start with a single critter and navigate through magical multiplication gates to grow your herd. But beware - one wrong choice could shrink your flock to nothing!

Sprint through vibrant worlds, from bustling farms filled with chickens to frozen tundras populated by penguins. Each environment brings new obstacles and challenges that will test your reflexes and decision-making skills. Dodge barriers, avoid hazards, and choose your gates wisely - multiply by 10 for massive growth, or play it safe with smaller numbers.

The bigger your flock, the higher your score, but also the greater the risk. Strategic gate selection is key - go big and risk it all, or build steadily and survive longer. With colorful graphics, smooth gameplay, and addictive mechanics, Flock Frenzy delivers non-stop action that's easy to pick up but challenging to master. How massive can you grow your flock?

name: Flower Bears
summary: Two bears want to plant a colorful garden, but are allergic to the other's flower of choice. Help them avoid some atchoos!

name: Floramino
summary: Floramino is a cozy roguelite puzzle game where you manage an ever-growing garden, hand out flowers to customers, and keep Springtime going.

name: Flappy Tobari
summary: This is a mini-game in which you play by dodging objects that seem to fly and hurt you.

name: Flyout
summary: Build and fly realistic aircraft. Use free-form fuselage and wing editor tools and tune your engines to recreate aircraft from any era or design your own.

name: Flyball
summary:
Flyball is a baseball arcade game which was released by Atari in 1976.

Both players must use an analogue joystick, 1P bats first and 2P pitches first, to control their players with one button to make them bat and pitch for the members of the batting team will run round the bases automatically - and unlike in real baseball matches, the game shall only last for one (or two) innings.

name: Flow
summary: FLOW is a laid-back drift racing experience designed for pure enjoyment and flow. Slide into a relaxing world where style matters more than speed and every drift feels smooth and satisfying.

name: Floain Plus
summary: "What's happiness?" No response. I knelt down to you ,praying for little comfort. Even if it's just a moment,I will capture it. This is My World:Third-Rate Romance Novels.But because it's me,it's fate,it's a childhood story written with my own hands. So,watch us:go far away,starting from that cliff—

name: Flask
summary: FLASK is a roguelike autobattler about alchemical greed on the new frontier. Build unstoppable homunculi, barter with mutated merchants, and slay hordes of monsters to harvest their valuable blood. It's time to get bloody... Bloody rich!

name: Floratic
summary:
In Floratic you play as a little drone that has been tasked with restoring the flora in an underground laboratory. Explore a different variety of vibrant flowers, fruits and underwater-plants and upgrade your laboratory to complete you task efficiently.

Unlock new crops at the research center and buy them at the vendinge machine afterwards. The plants will grow automatically in their designated auto-flowering-pots. Harvest them to gain research points and money.

Watch out though! Even if the plants grow by themselves, the pots and the drone are using up energy rapidly! If you don't watch you energy-gauge you might not be able to finish your task. Luckily some of the blue plants grant you electric charge to keep you running.

name: FlatOut
summary:
This is a mobile FlatOut now having new stunning graphics and top view. Complete three stages of the competition: Bronze, Silver and Golden.
You are going to experience races in the shady woods and snowy mountains..Mud, rain, snow and many other things.

name: Floral Disaffect
summary:
Servitor's friend Ouiki is kidnapped by the Nightmare Cult. A girl with plants growing out of her offers to help, seeing as her sisters were also taken. Servitor is part of the dreamer cult, and Ouiki's ultimate dream is to destroy the Nightmare Cult once and for all.

Will Servitor be able to form a team and achieve the dreams that wont stop flowing unendingly in Ouiki's mind?

name: Fling it! Shoe Kicking
summary: Fly, shoe, fly! Up into the sky! Swing and kick your shoe as far as you can! Become a shoe-kicking master!

name: Floors of Discomfort
summary: Floors of Discomfort is a fast paced, extremely difficult, rogue-lite, platformer. Choose from one of five unlockable characters, each with their own back stories, and reasons for being in the lair of Nexrolis.

name: Flat Heroes
summary: Flat Heroes is a minimalist super intense local multiplayer game with special care put into the game-feel and polishing of every detail in a trendy graphic experience. The game includes multiple cooperative and competitive modes for 1-4 players and features squares!

name: Flippy Bottle Extreme 2!
summary: Take your bottle flipping to the NEXT level! Flip left and right until the finish line!

name: Flying Sword
summary: Flight game that uses only mouse to play (Play for 10 minutes each time). In the game you need to control the sword to fly and collect 'aura stone' as much as possible.

name: Fledglings
summary: Crash landed on an alien archipelago, you must raise native Fledglings to fight off waves of sea creatures at night. Collect Fledglings, scavenge for resources, and survive the nights with the help of your companions.

name: Flight of the Intruder
summary: The player configures each plane's loadout for your mission, plans the mission package, then fly your missions. The player's task is to configure the planes and to plan and execute each mission, commanding multiple sections of each plane.

name: Flambeau: Deluxxx Edition
summary: The mansion is filled to the brim with treaters wanting a sweet reward...it's your job to make sure they spend the rest of their afterlife enjoying the sweet nectar of Flambeau's body.

name: Fleshinsane
summary: Fleshinsane is a biopunk slasher roguelite, where you explore an ancient spaceship but it's alive, changing and decaying! No checkpoints. Kill, die, upgrade, repeat!

name: Flip Out Rush
summary: Flip Out Rush is a mobile infinite runner that features a wide variety of characters customization, and events. Flip and Rush through unlockable areas to experience new ways to play, to rush to the top of the leaderboard to become the Flip Out Rush master!

name: Fluffy Kitchen Saga
summary: A restaurant simulation game located at the bottom of your computer screen, where both staff and customers are fluffy little animals! They’ll keep you company while you work/study. Let’s run a restaurant full of fluffiness!

name: Flipnic: Ultimate Pinball
summary: A pinball game with multiple twists. Flipnic isn't your basic pinball game, it's a psychedelic trip through fantastic land of pinball. The game features multiple tables in which the player must complete a given set of tasks before he or she can proceed to the next level. Each of the "tables" consists of many smaller playing areas and every one has some gimmick in them. For example, one must first freeze the waterfall and then destroy the ice and climb a mountain behind it. All this using only the paddles and the ball.

name: Floor 9
summary: In Floor 9, you find yourself trapped in a mysterious hotel known as "Hotel Liminal." To escape, you must identify anomalies on each floor. These anomalies can be anywhere - on the ground, in paintings, or even right in front of your eyes. You must check every corner carefully, as one mistake will send you back to the beginning, to Floor 9. The game offers you a unique blend of eerie atmosphere, puzzle-solving, and survival, all wrapped up in a psychologically thrilling experience.

name: Flood
summary: Prepare yourself for the flood! Build crazy, wobbly boats and battle your friends until only one is left afloat.

name: Flex Armstrong
summary: Flex Armstrong has mastered of the ancient art of bodybuilding. Follow him on his legendary path to heroism.

name: Floating Girl
summary: This is a "beautiful girl + hit the plane + choppy" combination of the game.You will encounter all kinds of beauties in space, some sexy, some cute, and some hot and passionate.With the downing of the plane, the beauties will meet you, and then...

name: Flufftopia: Fluffmazing Edition
summary: Flufftopia is a cute little clicker game with a story. Help your town to grow and eventually become Flufftopia! But wait… could there be even more?

name: Flight Catastrophe
summary: Flight Catastrophe gives you a unique opportunity to become a crisis management specialist aboard the passenger plane. You are the only one who can handle dangerous situations occurring during the flight! Command the crew, identify the threats, make difficult choices - many lives are on the line!

name: Flies in a Jar
summary: It is 2007. You are a security guard at the mysterious agency 'the FCL'. It's your first night on the job. What will you uncover? At what cost? Look through CCTV cameras and sift through emails to find out.

name: Flipside
summary: Two-player side on racing game with gravity-defying grip.

name: FlipCat
summary: FlipCat is a 2D platformer with a unique perspective rotation mechanic. Explore 30 challenging levels as a curious cat, overcoming obstacles, solving puzzles, and uncovering hidden paths in a vibrant pixel art world. Fun for all ages!

name: Flesh Reactor
summary: A sci-fi survival horror top-down shooter. Explore a decaying research facility, scavenge scarce resources, and survive against grotesque abominations.

name: Flood Runner 5
summary: Flood runner 5 is the fifth game in the very popular Flood Runner series. This game has added all the improvements from the previous games but has also added improvements of it’s own to make it one of the best games in the series.

name: Flashout 3D: Enhanced Edition
summary: The classical AG racer, Flashout 3D, initially released more than 10 years ago, is back, to celebrate the upcoming launch of Flashout 3! But we bring you not only the first installment of the series for free, but we have also remastered it and enhanced with upgraded graphics and new features!

name: Flotsam and Jetsam Potion Commotion
summary: A game similar to Breakout, but with much fewer "bricks". Later hacked to create Potion Commotion, which is nearly identical to the original.

name: Flashback 2: Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector’s Edition releases on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5, will include:

- Limited Edition
- The original Flashback video game in digital version
- An 8-inch (20cm) figurine of Conrad
- 3 lithographs
- A unique badge
- 2 stickers sheets

name: Flightless
summary: Help the flightless bird, Dover, fight his inner demons by teaming up with 7 partners in this turn-based RPG where your timing matters! Solve puzzles, beat baddies, and tackle platforming challenges to uncover the mysteries of a quirky island, save Dover's family, and fight for better mental health!

name: Flood
summary: Flood is a side-scrolling platformer in which the player takes control of Quiffy, a strange amphibious creature, on his quest to stop the flooding of his underground world. The gameplay is familiar (it is a platformer afterall), but there are some novel ideas, such as Quiffy's ability to cling to walls and ceilings.

name: Flashback 2: Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition of Flashback 2 includes
- The game
- An exclusive Steelbook
- The digital soundtrack

name: Flame of Valhalla
summary: Step into the world of Norse mythology and embark on your adventure beneath the mysterious, colossal World Tree. Accompanied by a brand-new realistic weather simulation system, where various weather conditions change in real-time, every step you take allows you to admire breathtaking scenery.

name: Flappy Meatbag
summary:
A challenging, fast paced and messy "2D" game with a cute little dude. Help him not get killed on his way to the finish line.

Platform: Android
Source Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sk.memex.flappymeatbag1

name: Floody
summary: Floody is a vertically scrolling and horizontally screen wrapped party game. Build your own platforms to survive from the up-going flood or shoot other players fall into the flood. If you like this game, please tell your friends.

name: Flock!
summary: Protect your cornfields and lock up your livestock, because Flock! is here! Pilot a UFO around vibrantly-colored landscapes in this charming sandbox puzzle game where you must herd animal life back to the Motherflocker. Using a powerful physics engine that drives many of the game’s elements, Flock! features over 50 pastoral puzzles. Pick up wood to form bridges, move boulders to create obstructions, and flatten fields into pathways all to help deliver your herd before time runs out! Flock together with a friend and even create and share your own crazy levels online.

name: Fly Punch Boom: First Impact!
summary: The DEMO for the WILDEST ANIME FIGHT, Fly Punch Boom! Fly super fast, smash your friends through skyscrapers and break the planet with one punch! Up to 4 players local & online. Now with workshop for INFINITE CHARACTERS!

name: FLOP
summary:
It’s been my view for a while that it’s a worthwhile exercise for any game designer to make a chess variant, a dice variant and a Pong variant. Speed Chess is my take on Chess, and this is my take on Pong. I originally built it as a secret mode for Sportsfriends, but people keep asking to show it at events, so I decided to put out a standalone build.

FLOP was designed to work with two gamepads, using both analog sticks, but I’ve rigged this up so it can also use two or four arcade spinners, which is more fun if you have them.

name: FlyManMissile
summary: Control missile to hit the enemy

name: FloofCorp.
summary: A single-player idle sticker game where white-collar workers escape to stress-free farms, collect ancient resources, process magical goods, and build personalized, ever-expanding dreamlands.

name: Flight of Nova
summary: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

name: Floyd's Sticker Squad
summary:
Shoot enemies, collect stickers and complete the album unlocking amazing adventures in this casual time travelling shoot em up!

Featuring an awesome Time Travelling mechanic, where you get to replay each level with your past-self, making yourself stronger every time! A great game for shoot'em up enthusiasts with epic boss fights!

name: Flower, Sun, and Rain
summary: Flower, Sun, and Rain is set on the Micronesian island resort of Lospass, and is loosely connected to the events of The Silver Case. The story follows Sumio Mondo, a "searcher" who makes a living looking for things people have lost. Mondo is initially contracted to defuse a bomb planted on a plane, but is so distracted with helping the islanders that the bomb goes off. He ends up caught in a timeloop, where he relives the same day running up to the explosion. Gameplay focuses on Mondo exploring the island, solving numerical puzzles with the help of his computer "Catherine" to solve people's problems on Lospass.

name: FluffyInn
summary: This is a special inn located at the bottom of your computer desktop, where everyone—from staff to customers—is fluffy! Unlock and purchase different facilities to improve customer satisfaction, earn more coins, then become the ultimate manager!

name: Fluffy Autumn
summary: You are Coco, a little lost kitten wandering aimlessly through Westpace Park until you meet Rocky. Your mission is to help Rocky find a bone that is lost somewhere in the park.

name: Flora
summary: A strategy puzzle game about flowers and their life cycle.

name: Flipping Two Minutes
summary: You have two minutes to match numbers. Three in a row is enough, four in a row is even better. Keep moving fast to get the high score.

name: Flippin Kaktus
summary: Flippin Kaktus is a brutal action-driven vendetta featuring a spiky hero with the thorny past and rage-outbreaks combat style. When the vicious “Calaveras” drug cartel raids his home, he breaks bad in a hardcore journey to save his foster family. Reveal the dark side of the wacky 80s punk and flip the switch to obliterate anyone in his path!

name: Floracide
summary:
Take revenge for a terrible betrayal from a corrupt god who promised so much, yet took everything instead. "I have no body. I can't shed a tear for my lost sisters"

Floracide can be seen as a sequel to Floral Disaffect, but can also be understood alone.

name: Flipping Frogs 64
summary: Flipping Frogs is a fast-paced platformer built around one mechanic: a grappling-hook tongue. Whether you’re snagging flies, launching across gaps, or chaining together perfect swings, the tongue is your main tool for movement, combat, and speed.

name: Flow Skate
summary: Introducing Flow Skate, a fast-paced 3D platformer with gameplay inspired by Sonic R and Kirby Air Ride, with a sharp cel-shaded aesthetic.

name: Flower Shop of Broken Wonders
summary: A short interactive fiction game about taking a look at a local run-down flower shop.

name: FlickaDrink
summary:
You've acquired an abandoned saloon, and its time to get the old shack cleaned up, furnished and full of customers!
Serve your short tempered patrons, before they get all fighty. Spend your earnings to improve your service and on decorating the saloon.

Get the tables full of guests, and be sure to flick those drinks to the right customer.

- Match drink colors to the customers orders, before they leave or start fighting.
- Knock out the angriest patrons.
- Manage the bar, when it gets rowdier every night!
- Improve your service and flicking abilities with ugrades.
- Purchase tables, lamps and other furniture and decorations, from the store.

Acquire wealth and expand your enterprise beyond the saloon and play sevaral wild west themed minigames.

name: Flow's Island
summary: You are one of the strays created by a multinational company determined to seize the power that hides on a mysterious island. Collaborate, survive, fight for your place in the pack and discover the magical secret of the tribes living on the Flow's Island.

name: Flames of Damnation
summary: The Flames of Damnation burn on your path – are you ready to face them?

name: Flan's BN
summary: 《Flan's BN》is the prequel to 《Flan's MS》, which combines JRPG and deckbuilder mechanics. Experience Flan's story of self-discovery

name: Flappy KFP
summary: A Flappy Bird clone about a KFP Employee trying to make their way to work. Don't fall into the fryer!

name: Flying Car Robot Flight Drive Simulator Game 2017
summary:
Flying Car Robot Simulator Takes you on a adrenaline-filled robot car experience.
Do you like transforming robot games? Maybe flying car simulators? This game is best for you!
You are the driver of a cutting-edge transforming robot car.Transform your car into a robot fly like an airplane Defeat enemies and save the humanity and be the hero of the world.

if you're excited to futuristic car games and robot games you will enjoy playing Flying Car Robot Simulator.


- Take control of an intelligent flying mech robot
- X ray weapon with unlimited ammo
- Realistic Transformations
- Dynamic Robot Combats
- Stunning Car Physics
- Realistic Flying Physics
- 5 thrilling game missions. (More coming soon)
- Realistic environment.
- Beautiful landscapes
- 3 different camera view

name: FlippUp
summary: You've activated an old Pinball machine—but with a twist. No points to score, just a mysterious mission to reach the top. We recommend you to try the demo before buying to avoid quick refunds- FlippTechINC.

name: Flashing Lights: Pickup Truck Triple Pack
summary: Expand your vehicle collection with the Flashing Lights Pickup Truck Triple Pack! This DLC includes police, fire and EMS pickup trucks, along with a generous selection of liveries.

name: Fly Caster VR
summary: "Fly Caster VR" immerses you in serene landscapes, casting your rod amidst breathtaking beauty. Experience the art of fly fishing with realistic physics, stunning graphics, and a dynamic ecosystem. Relax, explore, and embark on an unforgettable fishing adventure in virtual reality.

name: Flow Free: Shapes
summary:
If you like Flow Free, you'll love Flow Free: Shapes!

Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free: Shapes a try, and experience "mind like water"!

name: Flushed
summary: Flushed is an atmospheric first-person exploration game where you awaken in an abandoned asylum. To escape, you must find hidden keys in each room while facing a shifting, unsettling world. Explore, progress, and question reality as the environment distorts around you.

name: Flight Attendant Simulator: Onboard Tasks
summary: Welcome Aboard! Fasten Your Seatbelt—It’s Going to Be a Thrilling Ride!

name: FlingSmash
summary: The game is set on the fictional Suthon Island. It is said to hold the power to protect the world from harm, which it was protected by a large palm tree and watched over by the nature spirits in the island. Before the game, the antagonist, Omminus, takes over the island in order to rule the world. As a result, the palm tree begins the wither and the princess becomes ill. The leader of the nature spirits recalls an old legend about a hero using sacred pearls to restore the peace. He finds the treasure chest where the hero, Zip, resides. Zip, and a friend from the neighboring Eesturn Island, Pip, set out to retrieve the pearls and defeat Omminus.

name: Flats Full of Cats: Capes & Curses
summary: Step into a fairytale world full of heroes and enchantments! Help find the missing cats hiding in the homes of the Three Little Pigs, Little Red Riding Hood, and Beauty and the Beast. A magical adventure full of charm, whimsy, and plenty of paws.

name: Flip's Twisted World
summary: Flip’s Twisted World is a 3D puzzle-platformer that follows the adventures of Flip who is accidentally trapped inside a world where up and down are just a matter of perspective. By turning a magic cube, he is able to turn the entire world, opening up new paths and possibilities. Players must think “outside of the box” as they navigate the world that is literally in the palms of their hands.

name: Flame Land
summary: A 2D platformer inspired primarily by Kirby's Adventure and secondarily by classic Sonic. A collectathon with new characters and exits hidden around every corner, and an arcade game in which you compete for high scores. Cute and colorful, snacky and full.

name: Flamberge no Seirei
summary: Flamberge no Seirei is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Flying Nightmares
summary:
Flying Nightmares is a 3-D flight-sim game that has the player take to the controls of the Harrier jet, flying in a series of missions with realistic controls and weapon systems against a horde of enemy planes and ground units.

The player can also fly alongside three computer wingmen that will help them out during missions, completing certain objectives such as destroying certain enemy units or protecting friendly units. There is a multitude of views to choose from (1st, 3rd and even a missiles POV) and features FMV sequences between missions that tell the story of the game.

name: Flying Things
summary: Flying Things is a sandbox VR vehicle creator that will wake your inner inventor! Build your own wingy models using just your creativity and two bare hands! Visually refined and loosely inspired by the steampunk atmosphere, the game imitates a lucid dream. That means everything is possible!

name: Flag-O-Tron
summary: FLAGOTRON is a unique flagbuilder roguelike. No cards—just flags and strategy. Place flags, move them with chess pieces, build combos, and battle bosses.

name: Flagdoku
summary:
Guess nine flags that fill out the grid. Flags must meet the criteria of both the row and column corresponding to their cell. Wrong answers do not give any point; each correct guess gives one point, for a maximum score of nine points. Try to find the "Flag of the Day" that fits in all categories!

A new Flagdoku will be available each day!

name: Flypso
summary: Follow the development of Flypso, a tile-based open world sandbox 3D MMORPG in the making.

name: Flight Attendant & Ultimate Rock & Space Cleaner & Cash Guardian Simulator & Bundle
Fling with a Tiefling
summary: Fling with a Tiefling is a short fantasy romance visual novel that follows you, an adventurer whose journey is about to come to an end. With tonight potentially being the last night with your treasured Tiefling companion Karrus, how will you spend it with him?

name: Flap de Clap
summary:
Take on Mount Snoepje by flapping your way up with up to three friends. Be careful not to bonk too much or you might end up at the very bottom again.
Hunt for highscores in the endless runner mode, dodging and defeating various enemies and bosses.

name: Flight of the Amazon Queen
summary: Flight of the Amazon Queen follows a pilot for hire named Joe King who is hired to fly a famous actress to her next job, but ends up in a lightning storm and crashes deep in the Amazon Jungle. In the jungle, Joe uncovers a plot by a mad scientist to take over the world by creating an army of dinosaur women created from Amazon women.

name: Flowerbots
summary: Flowerbots is a short incremental journey about upgrading the bots, uncovering their synergies, and nurturing an efficient garden.

name: Flickyhack
summary: Flickyhack is a unique and challenging ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. Unlike standard hacks, its core mechanic revolves around avoiding the Flickies, when you destroy a Badnik, the liberated Flickies become hostile "turncoats" that actively attack Sonic rather than helping him.

name: Fleet Tycoon
summary: Turn a single ship into a maritime empire through clever upgrades and strategic planning. Combine upgrades in surprising ways to create a profit engine that breaks the game! Every addictive 3-minute cycle reveals new profit optimizations!

name: Fleshbirds
summary: Deep within a massive, overgrown forest, you quickly discover that you're not the only thing lurking there. The nearby abandoned church is the only safe place left to escape the terror...

name: Flic and Flac
summary:
The seven magic crystals are in danger. The world is under attack by Flic and Flac, two rogue creatures causing chaos and destruction.
Step into the action in this thrilling VR experience, armed with laser blasters, you'll blast your way through waves of enemies, collect yellow and red stars to rack up points and for the highest scores, hit the green musical notes in sync with the beat.

Flic and Flac is an electrifying blend of action, rhythm, and skill. Are you ready to save the crystals and become the ultimate VR hero?

name: Floor Plan Puzzle (Red Room Simulator)
summary: A floor plan was sent to the urban legend-researching VTuber, Roa Usagi. Hidden within it was a certain 'strange mystery.

name: Flaming Thunderer
summary: Flaming Thunderer is an action-platformer with adventure elements. Darkness has overtaken your village, monsters have come to your lands.

name: Flashback
summary: Flashback is a strategy game oriented to your choices. You will play the role of a deliveryman and live in a turbulent city for a month. You will meet various characters and experience events, and those characters' fates will cross and they will usher in their own futures based on your choices.

name: Flint
summary: A action-adventure game with a top down perspective and a heavy emphasis on story. Become the legendary Knight of Hamarolf and take on a myriad of foes from the Golden Oath to save the world from evil's reign while engaging with memorable characters and a thrilling combat loop.

name: FloodSim
summary: Floodsim is a flash-based serious game created by Norwich Union in cooperation with Playgen in 2008 in order to raise awareness of the dangers that flooding present to the United Kingdom. The goal of the game is to protect the people of the United Kingdom from floods that damage the economy and lives of the people through an assortment of realistic means over a time span of three years.

name: Flock
summary: A meditative digital toy

name: Flea!2
summary: FLEA!2 is a challenging platformer with an intriguing back story. Play once again as Henry the Hyperactive Flea who just can’t stop jumping! Navigate the beasts, collect blood and rescue all the fleas.

name: Flats Full of Cats: Bugs & Bolts
summary: Step into a spooky yet charming world of classic creatures! Find every hidden cat in the lairs of Frank, the Mummy, and the Swamp Monster. A playful mix of eerie and cute — perfect for those who love a little Halloween spirit all year round.

name: Flats Full of Cats: Stars & Oysters
summary: Set sail and reach for the stars in this culinary and cosmic expansion! Explore the cozy homes of a chef, a fisherman, and an astronaut, each hiding a fresh batch of curious cats among their everyday treasures.

name: Flashlight
summary: Salvage scrap, build defenses, and rank-up to survive against the hordes of zombies and enemy mercenaries in an action packed looter shooter roguelite survival or fight head to head with other players in Capture the Flag and Team Death Match.

name: Flats Full of Cats: Gold & Candles
summary: A royal and spiritual journey through time and class! Explore the cat-filled spaces of a church, a king’s palace, and a humble villager’s home. Every place tells a story — and every story has a cat to discover.

name: Flashtrek
summary: Ship graphics created by unknown authors, from freely distributed animated gifs. All original content free for any and all use. Star Trek and affiliated items copyright of Paramount Pictures.

name: Floors
summary:
Floors is endless arcade platformer with a twist!

Run and jump your way through endless amount of floors and deadly spikes! Collect rubies to unlock 30+ new cool characters. How long can you survive?

name: Flåklypa Grand Prix Jubileumsutgave
summary: Compared to the version released in 2021, this version includes another 8 mini-games from the 2000 edition released on PC, which, along with the classic gameplay, provides a complete and memorable gaming experience.

name: Florence
summary:
Florence is an interactive storybook from the award-winning lead designer of Monument Valley about the heart-racing highs and heartbreaking lows of a young woman's very first love.

Experience every beat of Florence and Krish's relationship through a series of mini-game vignettes - from flirting to fighting, from helping each other grow... to growing apart. Drawing inspiration from 'slice of life' graphic novels and webcomics, Florence is an intimate and unforgettable story.

name: Flowloop&
summary: flowloop& is a minimalistic anti-gravity racer where you try and stay on the track for as long as you can. Every day you can play on three new procedurally generated levels where you race around in 3D-space.

name: Flats Full of Cats
summary: Flats Full of Cats is a cozy hidden object game where you explore adorable apartments packed with feline friends!

name: Fleet Commander
summary:
Fleet Commander is a strategy game developed and published by ASCII Entertainment for the Famicom in 1988. It is the first naval battle game ever released for the system. While it supposedly depicts a battle between two fictional countries, the game is largely recognized to be a recreation of one of the crucial naval battles that occurred between Japan and the United States near the end of World War II. Players control a Japanese fleet of heavy cruisers, battleships, submarines and aircraft carriers.

A couple of things set this game apart from typical Famicom games. First, in addition to the cartridge and the manual, the game also came packaged with a large map and plastic models which represented ships and airplanes. The game never shows the entire state of the water, so it is up to the player to use the information that he or she has to update the representation of battle on the map using the plastic models. Second, no background music is heard while playing this game. Finally, this game makes use of a device known as the "Turbo File," which was manufactured and sold by ASCII as well. This device was a hardware add-on for the Famicom which was used to save game progress. It was compatible with a number of other titles.

name: Floatpoint
summary: It is night on this side of the planet. Settled areas are lit: a jagged crescent in the tropics, lining the inland sea. The bright splatter along the top of the curve is Tanhua, as bright from space as New York.
